cui_name: Adult Nodular Lymphocyte Predominant Hodgkin Lymphoma
reasoning: Nodular lymphocyte-predominant Hodgkin lymphoma (NLPHL) represents approximately 5% of all Hodgkin lymphoma cases. Global Hodgkin lymphoma incidence from GLOBOCAN 2005 is ~2.6 per 100k; estimated NLPHL incidence at ~0.13 per 100k. Moderate confidence due to limited NLPHL-specific registry data; relies on Hodgkin proportion estimates.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC), with NLPHL subtype proportion estimate from Lymphoma Research Foundation epidemiological data
